html: The Committee has approved the FY19 #HomelandSecurity Appropriations Bill on a vote of 29-22.
text: The Committee has approved the FY19 #HomelandSecurity Appropriations Bill on a vote of 29-22.

html: - Increased support for rescue beacons in border crossing areas - New funding for mental health care for children in @CBP custody and language to prioritize family reunification - Full funding for @USCIS, which handles the 8M+ individuals each year who enter this country legally
text:
- Increased support for rescue beacons in border crossing areas
- New funding for mental health care for children in @CBP custody and language to prioritize family reunification 
- Full funding for @USCIS, which handles the 8M+ individuals each year who enter this country legally

html: Other highlights of the bill: - Funding for @USCoastguard to improve readiness through training and equipment - $1.9B to detect and prevent dangerous cyber attacks and foreign espionage - $7.3B for @tsa to keep us safer as we travel and expedite the airport security process
text:
Other highlights of the bill:
- Funding for @USCoastguard to improve readiness through training and equipment
- $1.9B to detect and prevent dangerous cyber attacks and foreign espionage
- $7.3B for @tsa to keep us safer as we travel and expedite the airport security process
